content: introducing the cedar hollow shawl - a calming mindful make designed to elevate your everyday this large triangular shawl works beautifully in any colour offering a classic versatile silhouette with several ways to wear quick to crochet yet wonderfully refined it adds a touch of quiet sophistication to any handmade wardrobe whether worn as a standout piece or paired with your favourite layers the cedar hollow shawl is simply a beautiful piece you ll reach for season after season **yarn required ** approx 300g / 600m **yarn used in photos ** 1 ball of utopia crafts perfect aran ombre shade 001 - a **hook size s ** 6 mm closest us size j/10 pattern will work in other hooks and yarns though finished size may be different **you will also need ** a large eye yarn needle stitch markers scissors **finished dimensions ** wingspan 178cm 70in x 62cm 24in at widest point **gauge ** 11 treble_crochet and 7 row = 10 cm 3 9 obtaining the correct gauge is not critical for this project if you like this pattern then please come check out my other designs https //www ravelry com/designers/heather-c-gibbs-kcacouk this pattern is c designed by heather gibbs 2026 in collaboration with utopia crafts and is for personal use only not for resale patterns are not to be copied sold or distributed however you are welcome to donate gift as well as sell any of your finished items if you are an individual crafter if you sell your work online please credit the work as appropriate and link to my pages where you can thank you
